requestParams.name: mobile
requestParams.desc: 手机号码，手机号码或者buyerId二选一

responseParams.name: status
responseParams.desc:
调账状态
SUCCESS:成功
FAIL:失败
ING:处理中

struct.name: status
struct.desc:
调账状态
SUCCESS:成功
FAIL:失败
ING:处理中

responseParams.name: code
responseParams.desc:
结果码
200：调账成功
1001：调账处理失败
1002：调账失败，卡号不存在
1003：调账失败，本金余额不足
1004：调账失败，赠送金余额不足

struct.name: code
struct.desc:

200：调账成功

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['request_no']="12345"
params['remark']="112"
params['operator_name']="1"
params['operator_mobile']="2"
params['mobile']="16927237881"
params['card_no']="310200295489257"
params['adjust_type']=1
params['adjust_principal']=10
params['adjust_bonus']=5

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.cardvoucher.valuecard.fund.adjust', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'12345', 'remark' => '112', 'operator_name' => '1', 'operator_mobile' => '2', 'mobile' => '16927237881', 'card_no' => '310200295489257', 'adjust_type' => '1', 'adjust_principal' => '10', 'adjust_bonus' => '5', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
